reviewText: Punch is a movie that surprises you.  You think it is going to be a Korean "To Sir W/ Love" & then it isn't.  It is not about a boy succeeding in school.  It's bigger than that.  It is about his succeeding as a human being & family member.  Truly enjoyed this & hope Amazon offers it for sale soon, as a Region One movie because I want it to lend out to people I care about.  When you want to share a movie, then it is a five star rating!!!
